N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 502.8 - Additional time requirements for submission of requested information, and basis for penalties

State Regulations
(a) Requested information must be provided to
the department within 35 days of the written request for such information. Payment may be denied for services provided during the period beginning on the
day following the date the information was required to be provided to the
department and ending on the day before the date on which the information was
actually received by the department. (b) The department may refuse to approve any
claims submitted, a provider agreement or a contract with a fiscal agent, and
may terminate an existing agreement or contract, if the provider or fiscal
agent fails to provide the requested information. Notes
